title: Wood Elf Lineage
entryLore: Embodying the spirit of primeval forests, wood elves are swift, perceptive, and have a primal connection to nature. This lineage is known for its incredible speed and the ability to vanish into the natural world, often serving as guardians and scouts of the deep wilds.

traits.name: Fleet of Foot
traits.description: Your base walking [[speed|Speed]] is 35 feet, rather than the standard 30 feet for elves.

traits.name: Mask of the Wild
traits.description: You can attempt to hide even when you are only lightly obscured by foliage, heavy rain, falling snow, mist, and other natural phenomena.

traits.name: Wood Elf Magic
traits.description: You know the [[druidcraft|Druidcraft]] cantrip. You can cast [[longstrider|Longstrider]] (level 3) and [[pass_without_trace|Pass without Trace]] (level 5) once each per Long Rest without components.
